attributes.action: Keep the National Photography Museum in Bradford as part of the  Media Museum.
attributes.background: The Science Museum wants to handover the RPS collection to the V&A moving 1/2 million items to London to be stored, digitised, made available for study and exhibited. This work could  be undertaken in Bradford, if funding was available at a lower cost, in partnership with the V&A .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision is the responsibility of the Science Museum Group, which is operationally independent.
